summary: This mod simply adds some of the houses from ASOIAF into Skyrim as races. It\'s still a WIP so please backup your saves.
descriptionHtml:
Massive update for you contains : Lannister Armour, ASOIAF Races plus shields for each of         them and Night Watch shield, Roberts War-hammer, Ice and  Valyrian Battleaxe enjoy. :) 

_____________________________________________________________________________________


The currently added races are:

House Lannister - Find extra gold, can \'Pay their Debts\' to deal double damage whilst their             health is below 30

House Greyjoy - Have a 50% disease resistance and can breathe underwater (if anyone has any better ideas for the ironmen, please let me know

House Stark - 50% resistance to cold and the Starks can use the \'On My Honour\' ability to get others to fight for them

House Martell - Poisons crafted by the Martells are 20% more effective and they have a powerful resistance to poison

House Baratheon - The Baratheons have no natural resistances to boast of, but they can call the storm to destroy the enemies of Storm\'s End, they can also use the Hero\'s Roar to terrify their enemies into submission

House Targaryen - Instead of a normal resistance to fire, whenever a Targaryen is hit by fire damage they have a 50% chance of resisting it entirely. This means that there\'s a possibility of them getting the full amount of damage (Summerhall anyone?) but there\'s also a chance that they can resist it entirely (Drogo\'s Pyre?)

Plus an easter egg in Riverwood. If you can find and kill the \"Mountain that Rides\" then take a picture and let me know in the comments how you killed him :)
I cannot stress this enough,  back. up. those. saves. I love you guys, and this mod will turn into a full game of thrones mod. Fingers Crossed.

Changelog

1.01
Second update, mainly bugfixes

1.00
First release, races added
author: Aneurin
